name: Hiragana Memorizer
description: Improve your memory and learn Japanese the easy and fun way! Read, write, listen and play!   Totally free   Learn Hiragana through games  Kana writing animation - watch and learn the stroke orders  Human pronunciation - hear how kanas are pronounced  Kana writing practice - practice your writing right in the app  Easy-to-use app  Flash cards  Romaji and Hiragana  Helps your memory  Become a Pro  Works offline  Less than 5 minutes per day   Dont hesitate to contact us to give your suggestion and ideas. Thank you for your support!  hajime.apps@gmail.com
